--- alter_table_set_on_delete.sql
alter table foo set on delete cascade
--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 12,
    NameEnd: 15,
    Name:    "foo",
  },
  TableAlternation: &ast.SetOnDelete{
    Set:         16,
    OnDeleteEnd: 37,
    OnDelete:    "ON DELETE CASCADE",
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo SET ON DELETE CASCADE
